description: Add white noise to the team playlist
Make sure the work gets done by watching it being done
Always "Reply All" to emails
Arrive to meetings late and ask for a summary
Eat smelly food
Request another meeting.. and another.. and another one
Make sure you have the loudest voice in the room.. always
Take amazingly long lunch breaks
What budget? Raise another invoice
Schedule every meeting at your office
Forget your clients name
Confuse your client with their competitors - they do the same thing anyway
Go on day light savings time at random
Offer to make wake-up calls
Park diagonally in the car park
Lose the birthday/leaving card after everyone signs it
Wrap your lunch in foil and put it in the microwave
Break the coffee machine
Set off the fire alarm - when there is no fire
Ask for suggestions then ignore all suggestions
Use permanent markers on the whiteboard
Go on vacation but tell no one
Go on vacation but tell no one
